title: Upper-Intermediate English 401
headline: This free online English course teaches you to discuss your fears using extreme adjectives and adverbs.
description: This English course will test your understanding of various fears and how people respond to them and broaden your vocabulary in these areas. It also enhances your grammar by teaching you how and when to correctly use adjectives and adverbs and the similarities and differences of the intensifiers 'such' and 'so.' We recommend this course if you want to improve your core English skills and keep making progress. Enroll today!
courseDescription:
This English course will begin by expanding your vocabulary by teaching you about individuals' fears and how they react to those fears in different ways. Then, to help you further develop your English abilities, there are reading materials, video tutorials, and audio recordings accessible to you so you learn to pronounce words correctly.

The first grammar topic reviews adjectives and adverbs, including how to tell the difference between adjectives that end in '-ed' and those that end in '-ing.' It also talks about 'extreme adjectives' and how to use them instead of adverbs with weaker adjectives. The second grammar topic teaches you more about the intensifiers 'so' and 'such,' their similarities and differences, and how to use them with or without 'that.'

We have designed the final section of this course to help you become a more fluent English reader, speaker, and writer. Also, you will acquire new vocabulary linked with fear and all individuals' responses to it. A downloadable writing assignment is provided in the 'Resources' section to help you immediately practice your newfound knowledge. Make progress in English and register for this course today!
